in.teramatrix.flint.driver.util

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.teramatrix.flint.driver.util.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    These are some general functions that will be useful in almost all classes. Class consists of some methods to check internet connectivity, check google services, to getString screen height and width, to getString device IMEI number, to show alert dialog on different event etc. These all are common utilities.
    Author:
    Mohsin Khan
    Date:
    16 May 2016

    • Method Detail

      • isConnected

        public static java.lang.Boolean isConnected(android.content.Context context)
        Method is using Connectivity Services to getString Connectivity manager. that will find network information If we found connected state of any network that means we are connected to a network
        Returns:
        true if we are connected otherwise false

        Returns:
        IMEI number of the device

      • isRunning

        public static boolean isRunning(android.content.Context context,
                                java.lang.Class<?> serviceClass)
        To determine whether service already running or not.
        Parameters:
        context - to get system services
        serviceClass - which service is to be checked
        Returns:
        true if service running otherwise false

      • boldAllChildViews

        public void boldAllChildViews(android.view.ViewGroup parent)
        Bold Text is not supported if custom font is used. So it's necessary to bold text at runtime. This method will scan all the UI objects in the parent layout and if the child view is an instance of TextView then it will become bold.
        Parameters:
        parent - root UI control that holds child elements

      • setBold

        public static void setBold(android.view.View view)
        Method will change the typeface of the textview to bold
        Parameters:
        view - only textview or edittext allowed

      • toTitleCase

        public static java.lang.String toTitleCase(java.lang.String str)
        Method simply convert a string in title case and replace all underscores(_) to a white space character.
        Parameters:
        str - which is to be converted
        Returns:
        converted version of the string

      • trimChar

        public java.lang.String trimChar(java.lang.String s,
                                 char c)
        Method simply removes last and first character from the string if the character satisfies the condition. For example ,delhi, india, will be trimmed as delhi, india
        Parameters:
        s - which is to be trimmed
        c - character to be removed
        Returns:
        trimmed string

      • loadFragment

        public static void loadFragment(android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity activity,
                                android.support.v4.app.Fragment fragment)
        A method to load fragment on given activity with default settings. Settings mean, HomeFragment will be loaded separately on activity, and all other fragments will be in same fragment stack.
        Parameters:
        activity - on which the fragments will be loaded
        fragment - fragment to load

      • setListViewHeightBasedOnChildren

        public static void setListViewHeightBasedOnChildren(android.widget.ListView listView)
        If ListView is going to be loaded in another scrolling element like ScrollView, then ListView will be unable to measure height. In that case, we forcefully stretch the ListView.
        Parameters:
        listView - which height is to be calculated

      • alert

        public static void alert(android.support.v4.app.Fragment f,
                         boolean v,
                         int t,
                         int s)
        On any critical condition, a default layout has been designed in res/layout folder. This layout will be useful to acknowledge user for the condition. For example, if internet is not available to get data from the server, or any internal exception occurs, this screen can be used to display error or alerts.
        Parameters:
        f - fragment
        v - true to show otherwise false to hide
        t - title string (should be smaller in 4-5 words)
        s - subtitle string (may be descriptive in 2-3 sentences)

      • alert

        public static void alert(android.support.v4.app.Fragment f,
                         boolean v,
                         int d,
                         int t,
                         int s)
        On any critical condition, a default layout has been designed in res/layout folder. This layout will be useful to acknowledge user for the condition. For example, if internet is not available to get data from the server, or any internal exception occurs, this screen can be used to display error or alerts.
        Parameters:
        f - fragment
        v - true to show otherwise false to hide
        d - custom drawable resource id
        t - title string (should be smaller in 4-5 words)
        s - subtitle string (may be descriptive in 2-3 sentences)
